title: Collaborative Mathematics Learning Design in Higher Education Using Minecraft

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics concepts and basic Minecraft navigation skills
context.additional_context: Social domain-linked applied mathematics education for in-service professionals, incorporating BYOD environments, real-time video conferencing, and Minecraft server integration.

learning_goals: Learners collaboratively solve geometric spatial reasoning problems using 3D modeling in Minecraft
Learners exchange peer feedback using mathematical communication tools (chat, screenshots, recordings, etc.) in a CSCL environment
Learners enhance data-driven decision-making skills through Minecraft project implementation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
